Superbe conclusion d' une trilogie grandiose. Que dire de plus qui n' ai pas été dit sur ce magnifique jeu? C' est presque un sans faille: graphismes, jouabilité, histoire. Il a tout pour lui. 
Cependant, je ne puis m' empêcher de penser qu' il manque à ce jeu le petit "truc" qui le rendrait aussi profond que ses illustres prédécesseurs. L' univers de Rapture était à la fois glauque mais aussi enivrant. Les couloirs de cette cité engloutie puis oubliée, les petites soeurs et leur étranges companions ont marqué des générations de gamers, et sa destruction leur a brisé le coeur. Pourtant, on y retournait avec plaisir juste pour le plaisir des armes et pour perfectionner sa technique. Avec Infinite, les choses sont différentes: les armes sont très conventionnelles et peu inspirées. Vous ne pouvez en porter plus de deux en même temps, ce qui réduit considérablement le funplay. Et une fois le jeu terminé, on n' a pas vraiment envie de le recommencer. Très bon jeu, certes, mais à qui il manque un supplément d' âme. Le scénario et le twist final vous laisseront sans voix. Un jeu superbe à tous les niveaux, et c' est pourtant le moins réussi niveau gameplay. Ce jeu est un paradoxe.

This game blew past all of my expectations in ways I'd never imagined possible! So much fun, and that story is one of the best I've played since the orignial (probably passing that!).

Highly recommend this game to anyone.

Try catching this review Elizabeth. With awesome chain hooks and amazingly crafted environment graphics, Bioshock Infinite brings about the story of a ruthless weapon manufacturer tyrant, who scaled from high and low searching for the girl who you help escape from her prison. With simplistic 80's music and melodic symphony of orchestras playing through the jukebox, Bioshock Infinite has proven that a man with hook, can scale higher grounds and moutains - with the help of a railway train station.

The storylines are amazing and with twists in certain chapters throughout the game. Although with limited weaponry varieties, the game shows that certain weapons are to be abused and some are just not worth your time. Graphics aside, the amazing skyscrapers and fantastic views of the game will literally take your breath away for a moment. With actual chronological timeline of the early 70-80s, the game intensifies the natural beauty of our parents generation into games. 

Good things aside there seems to be a few missed out points and lack of innovation with the game. With the long storylines and the amazing setup battle locations, it seems to only resolve around you trying to fend of enemies, whom never attacks the girl, while you're just trying to get to a location. The special abilities you gained throughout the game was interesting but turns out you won't even use most of it to fight any boss stages or even come close to using them at all, since your mana pool is quite low even with considerate usage and upgrades. The collecting of coins and vending machines do provide certain upgrade which can benefit your weapons or your abilities but turns out if the weapon you currently use and would want to stick with it isn't for upgrade at the moment, then what's the point of upgrading the other weapons? Even with proper upgrades and maxing out all the others, it seems the game only resolves the ability usage and whether or not you've picked the correct spell for the current mission (including the weapons). Certain boss fights are just predictable and is just too easy no matter the difficulty.

Overall, the game is not only fun and filled with colorful optical illusions, as if you're in a pony land dreamworld, it also brings about the joyfulness and sadness within a wonderful game. Recommend to set the gamma settings following the tutorial to avoid epilepsy and not play too long for a time to avoid eye sores.

Pros:
*Amazing environmental graphics with true colors
*Pretty girl
*Grapple Hook
Cons:
*Weapon inventory limits
*Repetitive battle locations
*Certain stage causes FPS to drop

Oyunun senaryosu ile bir film bile yapılabilir , çok zengin ve güzel bir hikayeye sahip fakat oyun size bu hikayeyi tam anlamıyla anlatamıyor.Kafanızda kalan soru işaretlerini gidermek için bitirdikten sonra hemen oyunu kapatıp forumlarda araştırmaya başlıyacaksınız.Oynanış olarak oyunda sürekli bir çatışma içinde olmamız insanı bir süre sonra sıkıyor.Özel güç olarak sahip olduğumuz Vigorlar'ı oyunun başlarında kullanmak zevkli fakat oyunun ilerleyen kısımlarında düşmanlara karşı fazla etkili olduğu söylenemez , o yüzden sadece sersemletmek veya etkisiz hale getirip düşmanı daha kolay öldürmek açısından işe yarıyor.Oyunun geçtiği şehrin ismi Columbia. Halkın peygamber olarak gördüğü kişi (Comstock) tarafından kurulan , gökyüzünde bir şehir.Şehrin tasarımı çok güzel ve grafikler de oldukça iyi.Oyunun başından beri bize gösterilen Songbird ise oyunun sonundaki boss olarak beklediğim karakter olsada öyle olmuyor.Maalesef oyunun sonunda bir boss yok.Herşeye rağmen oynanması gereken bir oyun olduğunu düşünüyorum.

Так как все уже написали про эту игру оставлю рецепт пиццы "четыре сыра"
1.  Соединить в чаше миксера 1,8 килограмма обычной пшеничной муки (например «Сокольнической») и 300 грамм итальянской муки семолы, добавить 36 грамм соли и 10 грамм сахара, перемешать. В 200 мл теплой воды развести 16 грамм дрожжей. Замесить тесто, вливая в муку 500 мл теплой воды, а также воду с дрожжами. Затем влить 220 мл молока (3,2%-ное будет в самый раз) и продолжать вымешивать, пока тесто не станет эластичным. Если понадобится, влить еще немного молока. В самом конце хорошо вмешать 50 мл оливкового масла extra virgin. Накрыть чашу с тестом пищевой пленкой и оставить на час при комнатной температуре — подняться. Затем немного помять тесто руками и убрать в холодильник на полчаса — и после этого можно приступать к работе.
2.  Небольшую форму для выпечки (где-то 20×30 см) смазать ложкой оливкового масла, выложить тесто и, разминая, растянуть его по дну формы от центра к краям: должен получиться кочковатый лист (идеальная ровность домашней пицце совсем не к лицу). Дать тесту постоять в тепле пятнадцать-двадцать минут — к примеру, на плите с уже включенной ­духовкой: дрожжи продолжат свою работу и сделают тесто ­пористым.
3.  Разогреть духовку до 250 градусов, поставить в нее форму с тестом на пять минут, чтобы оно немного подсушилось.
4.  Моцареллу (не шарики в рассоле, а плотный, сухой сыр — специально для пиццы), эмменталь и горгонзолу (которую можно заменить любым другим голубым сыром) нарезать мелкими кубиками, пармезан натереть.
5.  Выложить на подсушенное тесто моцареллу и эмменталь, посыпать пармезаном, а сверху выложить горгонзолу. Вернуть форму в духовку, а через пять минут подавать пиццу на стол.

Reasons why you should play Bioshock Infinite: 

[*] You get to have gunfights with Robo-George Washington
[*] You can find a pineapple in the the same box you found gun ammo
[*] You get baptized one moment and the next you're slaughtering a constable
[*] SKY HOOKING
[*] Eat everything you find and not become morbidly obese
[*] Trash cans are now your best friend
[*] You get to rescue an attractive girl who then follows you everywhere 
[*] RAGTIME 
[*] You'll find more money in old boxes and lying around on the streets of Colombia to set you up for retirement
[*] Loot all the ded peoples
[*] In 1912
[*] You are now a steampunk pirate
[*] That can alter time and space
[*] Hell yeah

Reasons why you shouldn't play Bioshock Infinite: 

[*] The ending kicked me unexpectedly in the honey nut feelios and I can't get up

Наконец я прошел эту шэдэвральную игру. Сложилось так, что я купил артбук на эту игру раньше, чем купил, а тем более прошел этот шедевр. Честно говоря я являюсь гневным противником серии баяшок, но колумбия сразила меня наповал и если бы не фанатская-проффесиональная озвучка я бы так и забыл про эту игру. Про сюжет ничего говорить не буду, ибо буду просто делиться своими впечатлениями. Дизайн локаций просто приводят в восторг (двухсмысленно звучит), все красиво, красочно и так далее. Главные персонажи очень интересные. Близнецы, очарвоательная Элизабэт (а в нашей озвучке она еще прекрасней!), да даже букер шикарен, хоть за всю игру мы его почти не видим. Геймплей.... Я ненавижу баяшок за геймплей и псевдо крутой сюжет, а тут геймплей просто шикарен, он динамичен и удобен в отличие от первых частей, чего стоят только рельсы и ближний бой. Сюжет настолько шикарынй, что взрывает мозг. Итог: Для меня игра входит в список лучших игр десятилетия. 9,5\10 (снял пол бала за то, что пришлось анализировать концовку в вики)
Good game that has a interesting story and great world design 9/10

El juegos es sublime con una narrativa espectacular, y es que irrational games se supero y de que manera facil facil es el mejor juego de la historia con un final de 10 minutos que vale cada uno de ellos, que te quita el corazón y te lo devuelve al puro final solo para que te salgan las lagrimas y es que me he enamorado y no solo de Elizabeth si no que tambien me enamore del juego y es que con una cantidad de metaforas y de ver el mundo actual en una epoca donde faltan valores humanos, donde se valora mas un buen peinado que un buen cerebro, una epoca que te convence que el mundo no vale nada , que todo lo que tenga que ver con la humanidad te deja con un sabor de boca amargo, distante y frio, esta representacion esta en la metafora perfecta que es la ciudad de columbia en la cual se desarrolla el juego.
La jugabilidad es una maravilla en la maxima dificultad, la inteligencia artificial de Elizabeth es una maravilla, la enemiga es muy buena, los graficos en ultra son perfectos y se seguiran viendo genial durante los años suiguientes años.

Oh hell yes! This game was my favorite Bioshock by a long shot. I was starting to get tired of the series since the second one was a bit of a let down for me. I decided to give this one a chance and I'm so glad I did. It brings a fresh new feel to the basic idea and does it flawlessly. I was so bummed out when the game ended. At the same time, the story ended in such a cool way that it was all worth it. I will deffinitely be playing this game again in the future. Buy it! Now!

The BioShock series had never caught my attention - I always thought it was just another artsy FPS.

But I have NEVER come across a shooter, no, a game that just FLOWS so smoothly as this one. 

Everything, the combat, the phenomenal story, the amazing soundtrack and the entire premise and aesthetic just fit so perfectly into this stunning work of art - The hype was justified and Irrational has made one of the best games of this decade.

I can't believe this was sheleved in my library for almost nine months. Everything about this game is amazing. The whole experience left me speechless and in awe for days after finishing it.

Strongly reccommend.

Elizabeth,

Voulez-vous aller à Paris avec moi ? Pouvez-vous me dire que vous m'aimez ? Non, non, non, c'est pas correct. Je dois utiliser "tu, te, toi". 
Tu me manques. Je veux dire ça tous les jours. Mais pourquoi tu m'abandonnes ? J n'oublierai  jamais, jamais. 
Nous avions une promesse: je t'emmène à Paris. Tu t'en rappelles ?


Ce qui précède est seulement une lettre que je veux envoyer au jeu. Maintenant, on y va, En jouant Bioshock infinite, j'ai trouvé l'amour et les peines dans notre vie. J'ai cru qu'Elizabeth a  tombé amoureuse avec le peuvre homme, mais le fin n'est pas comme ça. Le destin a nous emmené à quelque part où on n'en sait pas.
Игра великолепная, и не  предсказуемый сюжет, единственный минус для меня это слишком часто сражаешься и тебя начинает тошнить

One of the better games I ever played, just beautiful...

10/10

First off, if you like amazing storylines and games where you shoot people, don't hesitate and buy this game! It's really complex and you can see that someone has put their heart and a lot of time into it. I have played through this game multiple times and I still find new things every time I play it. 

This would quickly turn into a long wall of text if I was to write all the positives about this game, so I'll just list the negatives:

-Saving system: The game saves whenever it sees fit (usually it's after you have moved on in the story) and you can't have more playthroughs at the same time (though I think I've seen some file shenanigans that make it possible). 
-Shooting through sights: You'd think, sights=more steady and accurate, right? Well, with the exception of a sniper rifle, I found out that's not really true. Hitting people on long range seems easier unscoped than scoped, which is kinda odd.

So these are pretty much the only negatives that I've found during my few playthroughs through the main story. Other than that, the game is amazing. The graphics are top notch, the voice acting as well, the story? 10/10; you just can't go wrong with this game.

The DLCs are once again amazing story-wise. There are new vigors, weapons and you get to explore the whole Bioshock story from a new perspective. The second part of Burial at Sea was the best. Play it, you'll see why.

Игра с великолепным сюжетом, чертовски крутыми и запоминающимися героями, восхитительными локациями и атмосферой!)Это та самая игра за которую не жалко отдать свои деньги и потратить своё время на этот шедевр. Моя оценка 10 из 10. 
+++Плюсы игры+++
1). Сюжет 
2). Атмосфера 
3). Огромный и красочный мир, в котором каждый уголок полон деталей которые хочется посмотреть. 
4). Элизабет :3 (Именно этот герой оставит в вашей памяти след, Элизабет не просто напарник который тупо следует за вами и что-то бормочет себе под нос, она взаимодействует со всем окружающим миром с каждой его частичкой делая игру ярче и интереснее) 
5). Обширное количество классных плазмидов и в добавок их ещё можно апгрейднуть, и ещё куча различных деталей которые делают геймплей очень интересным. 
6). Множество разных типов врагов 
7). Пасхалки и различные приколюхи от разработчиков которые можно обнаружить во время игры.
8). Ну и конечно же в игре не мало сложных ачивок которые могут привлечь игроков которые любят проходить игры на 100% а именно хардкор мод, сбор различных аудиозаписей и апгрейдов и т.д.)

[h1]Bioshock Infinite [/h1]... Aah o que falar desse jogo ?? 

 Sem duvidas um dos melhores jogos FPS que eu já joguei, uma historia espetacular e que você tem que zerar mais de uma vez para ficar satisfeito!
 A historia desse game no começo é confusa, mas depois de um tempo tudo se encaixa no seu devido lugar, claro que pra isso vc tem quebar um pouco a cabeça, pois, é uma historia muito complexa e que te deixa encucado e te leva a querer jogar novamente o game.

ATENÇÃO: O CONTEÚDO A SEGUIR PODE CONTER SPOILERS.

 [spoiler]O jogo se desenvolve em uma misão que o protagonista, Booker DeWitt, tem que resgatar uma menina, Elizabeth, que se localiza em Columbia (uma cidade voadora). Ao decorrer do jogo vc descobre que essa menina, tem o poder de abrir fendas para diferentes dimenções, espaço e tempo, é nisso que o jogo segue.
 O final do game é realmente muito Blow-Mind (E eu que achava que o final mais Blow-Mind era o de "The wolf among us"... Esse superou.) e é ai que todas as peças do quebra-cabeça se encaixam.[/spoiler]

 Bioshock Infinite foi uma daquelas experiências extasiantes, ele te droga no final, te deixa alucinado e você quer mais. Hahahah.

 [h1]Uma listinha para vocês sobre o que eu achei do jogo: [/h1]

Gráficos: 10/10
Jogabilidade: 10/10
Personagens:10/10 
Trilha sonora: 9/10 
Cenas de ação: 11/10
Historia: 12/10

 Se você esta pensando em comprar, não só esse, mas toda a franquia, compre. Vale muito mais que a pena, vale a galinha toda! hahah.
소설같은 게임은 정말 사랑할수 밖에 없다. 이 게임이 딱 그렇다. 사랑할 수 밖에 없고, 아름답게 슬픈 게임이다. 말그대로 바이오쇼크다.

This game made me cry when i ended it. good gameplay graphics and all around 
A MAGNIFICENT STORY
Non avendo giocato i capitoli precedenti posso solo dire che Bioshock Infinte ha una delle storie più belle che io abbia mai visto. Sul finale sono rimasto a bocca aperta...

Что можно сказать об BioShok. Игра очень специфичная, особенно 1 и 2 часть, они как хоррор!
НО!!!
Infinite очень сильно отличается, но если вы не прошли 1 и 2 часть вам будет не понятен конец.
Плюсы:
-очень красивый мир, и очень потрясающие пейзажи!
-довольно много оружия
-не тупые боты
-есть ДЛС)
Минусы:
-нету мультиплеера (его тут не хватает)
-без ДЛС игры хватит часов на 7
Итог 8 из 10
Покупайте, тут жалеть не о чем)

First hour is very promising, great setting, visuals etc.

After that it's just a plain old boring shooter with terrible story telling.
魔性画风+独特的想象力，因却思听!
13年PC游戏最佳

While it can be a little oppresively linear it more than makes up for it with its vast combination of skillsets and weapons. One of the best RPG's of its time and definitly one of the most attractive. It's plot can get a little... rediculous, but when your dealing with different dimensions and stuff like that you expect it to get a little wonky.

9/10

When I played the first BioShock game, many years ago, I was amazed!
I never preferred FPS games and I only played it when a friend show it to me and let me play a level near the end in the middle of the game.

BioShock II was ok but much more of the same, so I was a bit bored.

BioShock Infinite was... WOW
You actually saw the world changing because of your actions! You could see the people around you react to whatever was happening.

I highly recommend this game and I hope for another!
If you are into a game with good story and good fps, this is for you.

I finished the story in 12 hours and to this day has been the only game that I didn't mod right after the intro. As a matter of fact, I did not mod this game whatsoever which is a first for me ;) 

Pros:
-Personal favorite game of all time
-Very well optimized (ran perfectly on my nvidia 635m HP laptop << P.S. Don't get my setup to run it)
-AMAZING graphics, jawdroppingly good
-a storyline better than some of Spielberg's movies
-amazing concepts and ideas which stem from quantum physics

Cons
-I began playing at 11pm and got so caught up in the game that I thought I only played 2 hours... it was already 5am...

Juegos como este son los que hacen que gastar el dinero sea todo un placer.
10/10

Surpreendente! A história do jogo é fascinante, principalmente no final, que me lembrou bastante o filme "O Predestinado", assistam.
Variedade de armas, vigores, o mundo é enorme, a fantasia, enfim... um dos meus melhores investimentos em 2015 foi ter adquirido BioShock Infinite.

This was an amazing game. Its definatly one of my all time favorite games, from the amazing storyline, to the balance enemies, to the levels, this game is overall one of the greatest games every. To anyone who's considering buying this: WHY HAVE YOU NOT BOUGHT IT ALREADY STOP READING THE REVIEWS AND BUY THE DAMN THING ALREADY.

Now if you'll excuse me, I have 1999 mode to beat
10/10
